Paul,

in http://mail.python.org/pipermail/xml-sig/2002-February/007186.html
you write:

"I need a schema language that says what happens when you follow links,
 or apply HTTP methods to things that are referenced in links...I guess
 I'll have to do it myself some day."

Do you (or someone else) have any pointers to material related to this
issue?

Do you have any specific ideas how to formalize the way to 'say what happens'?
[a defined set of actions/modifications on representations perhaps?]

If there is any effort going on in that direction, I'd be happy to contribute.

Thanks in advance,


Jan
